text: in eastern Ukraine nerves are running

than they could see civil war a week
after a failed Accord in Geneva the

Ukraine while there is some support for

who are in favor of staying in an
independent Ukraine what all this means

successful vote to maintain legitimacy
meanwhile Moscow realizes that no

disruption so that an argument can be
made that no fair vote is possible under
